text:
I've been thinking about the
stage production for our live~!

First, a big picture book will open,
and then, with smoke, Tenka and the others will appear!

We'll portray ourselves as characters...
No, as protagonists.

Yeah, yeah! And then!
When the smoke clears, you'll see our costumes!
Wow, that sounds like an exciting production.

Hehe, I hope the fans will get excited too,
and then we'll perform the first song~!
That's the image for the opening scene!

I see...
I'm curious about what comes next.
Next, we'll... change the lights to warm colors.

It'll feel like a leisurely, happy time is continuing~
That kind of vibe!

That way,
everyone might feel more at ease.

Indeed.
It's well thought out. So, what about the ending?

Ehehe...
I haven't quite figured it out yet...
